description: RDS instance requires the VPC and private subnets to exist for placement.
mitigation_plan: Task is assigned to the same developer and will be executed sequentially.

description: The frontend registration flow requires the AWS Cognito User Pool to be provisioned and configured.
mitigation_plan: Prioritize Cognito infrastructure in Sprint 1 to unblock Sprint 2 auth work. Frontend can work against a mock auth service initially.

description: The frontend's post-login data fetching logic requires the backend GET endpoints for user data to be available.
mitigation_plan: Define API contracts early in the sprint. Frontend can use a mock server (e.g., MSW) until the backend endpoints are deployed to dev.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks completion of the login feature.

description: The online synchronization logic is responsible for processing the queue of offline requests created in IndexedDB.
mitigation_plan: Develop a comprehensive test suite covering various conflict scenarios. The server must be the authoritative source for timestamps.
impact_if_delayed: The entire offline sync feature is incomplete.
